input_text:
Job Title: Graduate Recruitment Consultant

Location: New York, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Customer Service, Sales

Description:
âš¡ENTRY-LEVEL RECRUITMENT CONSULTANTâš¡May 7th 2024 Start DateManhattan, New York (full time, in-office position)
Are you ambitious? Are you a people person? Do you thrive in a sociable and fast-paced environment? If so, weâ€™d love to speak to you! We are hiring for our next Academy intake in which you will build relationships to last a lifetime and have dedicated training delivered by our onsite Performance coaches to ensure you have a platform to succeed. Here at Levin, we pride ourselves on Attracting, Training and Retaining talent, so get in touch today and see how we can help shape your future.
Who are we?Created in 2019, Levin has become the leading tech recruitment company that operates in FinTech, HealthTech, GreenTech, RetailTech, EdTech, and AI industries.
In just 4 years we have grown from a 3-person start-up to an established business with international offices in London, Amsterdam, New York, and Hamburg. Our sales team are grown organically from within the business, and we have made a commitment to continually provide opportunities.
Levin are on a mission to lead the Tech recruitment sector globally; to Connect Tech Talent, we need the best talent. We are using a model which focuses on providing our consultants with world-class training (both formal and on the job training) and all the best recruitment technology out there.
What we offer:Benefits:Â· $58,500 base salary + uncapped commission (expected first year OTE of $60,000-$80,000+, top performers $80,000-$100,000+)Â· Clearly defined progression structureÂ· 401K, Health and Dental InsuranceÂ· 3pm Friday finishÂ· Target-based relocation abroad options at any of our international officesÂ· Potential equity in the business for top performersÂ· 20 Vacation days + 16 National Holidays (additional holiday days at each level of seniority)Â· Day off on your BirthdayÂ· 1-day WFH every week (After 6 months)Â· GymPass (discounted gym membership at every major gym branch) (After 1st promotion)
Culture:Â· Dress-down cultureÂ· Amazing modern offices in The One World Trade CentreÂ· Eligible for target-based incentives including Michelin star restaurants, activities, international vacations, free breakfasts, late starts, early finish and more!
What youâ€™ll be doingYou will be what we call a 360Â° consultant, which means youâ€™ll be managing the entire end to end recruitment processThat includes business development, building relationships and winning business with senior executives at the top Tech firmsYou will also be responsible for finding candidates for those organizations, building relationships with them in order to find them the perfect new roleNo prior recruitment experience is needed as we have a structured induction program and a tailor-made Learning & Development syllabus. Additionally, we offer a personalized training programme with guidance and coaching for all levels of your recruitment careerYou will have a huge part to play in the growth of Levin Group, driving our culture and being part of defining what the company will look like for years to come
What we are looking for2021, 2022, or 2023 Graduates preferredNo prior recruitment experience is neededSales or business development experience is preferredMoney-motivated, ambitious individuals that have a desire to progress quickly in their careerSomeone with a competitive edge that is driven by the sheer need to winâ€¦pretty much everythingSocial personality with exceptional communication & people skillsSelf-motivated individual that is able to work towards and meet targetsSomeone who has demonstrated resilience and has a growth-mindsetSomeone who is wanting to work with like-minded people in a fun, collaborative environmentQuite simply we are looking for people who want to be part of something special, as simple as that
Location:ðŸŒŽ New York City (or open to relocating) as this is an in-office position
Interested in applying?ðŸ“§ Please click on the â€˜Easy Applyâ€™ button or send me an email to elle.baker@grouplevin.com
Levin Group is committed to building a diverse and inclusive business, a place where everybody can be themselves and be successful. We believe that success is earned through merit, and we are happy to make any arrangements where possible to make sure such an environment possible. If you have any particular requirements to support you in being able to interview and work with us, then please let us know.
Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
